
/* Akshat Mathur 
	IIIT Allabahad */
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define FOR(i,a,n) for(int i=a;i<n;i++) //for loop
#define si(x) scanf("%d",&x) // scan int
#define sll(x) scanf("%lld",&x) // scan ll
#define ss(x) scanf("%s",x) // scan string
#define pi(x) printf("%d\n",x) // print int
#define pll(x) printf("%lld\n",x) // print ll
#define ps(x) printf("%s\n",ch) // print string
#define INF 2000000000 // infinity
#define ll long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define fr first
#define se second
int main()
{
	int t;
	si(t);
	while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        si(n);
        
        vector<int> v;
        FOR(i,0,n){
            int x; si(x);
            v.pb(x);
        }
        sort(v.begin(),v.end());
        
        int i=0, j=n-1;
        while(i<j)
        {
            printf("%d %d ",v[j--],v[i++]);
        }
        if(i==j)
        printf("%d\n",v[i]);
    }
	return 0;
}
